# iosxr_l2vpn_bridge_group_bridge_domain_access_vfi (Resource)

This resource can manage the L2VPN Bridge Group Bridge Domain Access VFI configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_l2vpn_bridge_group_bridge_domain_access_vfi" "example" {
  bridge_group_name  = "BG123"
  bridge_domain_name = "BD123"
  access_vfi_name    = "ACCESS_VFI1"
  shutdown           = true
  neighbors = [
    {
      address = "10.1.1.1"
      pw_id   = 1000
      static_mac_addresses = [
        {
          mac_address = "aa:bb:cc:dd:ee:01"
        }
      ]
      pw_class = "PW_CLASS_1"
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `access_vfi_name` (String) Specify the access virtual forwarding interface name
- `bridge_domain_name` (String) Configure bridge domain
- `bridge_group_name` (String) Specify the group the bridge belongs to

### Optional

- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `neighbors` (Attributes List) Specify the peer to cross connect (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--neighbors))
- `shutdown` (Boolean) shutdown the Access Virtual Forwarding Interface

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

<a id="nestedatt--neighbors"></a>
### Nested Schema for `neighbors`

Required:

- `address` (String) IPv4 address of the peer
- `pw_id` (Number) Specify the pseudowire id
  - Range: `1`-`4294967295`

Optional:

- `pw_class` (String) PW class template name to use for this pseudowire
- `static_mac_addresses` (Attributes List) Static MAC address (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--neighbors--static_mac_addresses))

<a id="nestedatt--neighbors--static_mac_addresses"></a>
### Nested Schema for `neighbors.static_mac_addresses`

Required:

- `mac_address` (String) Static MAC address

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_l2vpn_bridge_group_bridge_domain_access_vfi.example "<bridge_group_name>,<bridge_domain_name>,<access_vfi_name>"
```
